nodes.bodyText: I know this isn't your change, but all other models with these 2 fields are prefixed with Blackduck while this one is JobProvider. Might be something we want to look into making more clear.
Yeah, the whole Job REST API is being redone in 6.5.0, so this is really just a placeholder for now.
The other thing to keep in mind is that this is the model displayed in Swagger. So it will be consistent with our current provider-centric API.
